---
title: Release notes not reappearing when changed
date: 2020-03-16
type: Resolved Issue
topics:
  - Settings
description: |
  No more old release notes popping up in external feeds, we found the bug.
---

 * Authors can change old releases now, e.g. to fix spelling errors without the release note popping up again in feed consumers
 * Release Notes have an autogenerated unique ID now.
